DOC.brief_summary: The main hypothesis test use quality improvement programme lead measurable improvement management care use evidence base treatment patient present hospital non-ST elevation acute coronary syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: European Quality Improvement Programme Acute Coronary Syndromes
DOC.criteria: Patients good clinical history ACS least one follow : New transient ST T wave change ECG consistent acute myocardial ischaemia Elevation troponin cardiac marker level indicative myocardial necrosis accord local laboratory value Evidence persistent ST elevation ECG Use early reperfusion therapy Patients > 80 year Patients transfer another hospital
